00028 /* simple memory stream functions with buffer overflow check */
00029 
00030 #ifndef __STREAM_H__
00031 #define __STREAM_H__
00032 
00033 struct Stream
00034 {
00035     unsigned char *mem; // location in memory
00036     unsigned int size;  // size
00037     unsigned int pos;   // current position
00038     Stream(unsigned char *m, unsigned int s) : mem(m), size(s), pos(0) {};
00039     unsigned int seek(unsigned int p);
00040 };
00041 
00042 unsigned int mem_read(Stream & mem, unsigned long long & i);
00043 unsigned int mem_read(Stream & mem, unsigned int & i);
00044 unsigned int mem_read(Stream & mem, unsigned short & i);
00045 unsigned int mem_read(Stream & mem, unsigned char & i);
00046 unsigned int mem_read(Stream & mem, unsigned char *i, unsigned int cnt);
00047 
00048 #endif // __STREAM_H__
00049
